name: If Your Not Dumb Just Jump
name_original: If Your Not Dumb Just Jump
description:
Thank you for wanting to play my game the game is about survival and also beware of the killer rate it is about speed so watch out the death zone doesn't kill you so If Your Not DumB Just Jump!! Have fun! Movement: A/D  Look With Camera Up & Down W/S Press Space to Jump Controller Movement Stick Left/Stick Right
Press X to Jump Credits! Youtube Channel: TopMusicPlay Free Song
